DataListSpec.Name: EFT Decline Batch Process Data List
DataListSpec.Description: EFT Decline Batch Process Data List.
DataListSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_EFTDECLINEBATCH_BUSINESSPROCESS( @CURRENTAPPUSERID uniqueidentifier = null ) as set nocount on;
select bizproc.ID, bizproc.NAME, bizproc.DESCRIPTION, bizproc.BATCHNUMBER, bizproc.BATCHTYPE, BPI.OWNERID from dbo.USR_EFTDECLINEBATCH_BUSINESSPROCESS bizproc LEFT JOIN dbo.BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE BPI on bizproc.ID = BPI.BUSINESSPROCESSPARAMETERSETID where dbo.UFN_SECURITY_APPUSER_GRANTED_BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE_IN_SYSTEMROLE(@CURRENTAPPUSERID, bizproc.ID) = 1 order by bizproc.NAME
